name: Stichting PSI-Europe
goal: The mission of stichting PSI-Europe is to make it easier for people in the developing world to lead healthier lives and plan the families they desire by supporting, promoting and generating resources for the PSI network. PSI-Europe represents PSI network vis a vis European stakeholders and networks (including the Government of The Netherlands). The PSI network’s mission is to measurably improve the health of poor and vulnerable people in the developing worlds, principally through social marketing of family planning (FP) and health products and services and through health communications.
interests: Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives:
Stichting PSI-Europe monitors the following EU initiatives and policies indirectly, mainly through the European Parliamentary Forum (EPF) and the EuroNGOs:

 European Commission Annual Work Programme and Roadmaps

 European Parliament Legislative Observatory
